messagePart0:
Hi [prospect_first_name] [prospect_last_name],

I hope you are right.

We propose [my_proposition] to many players in [prospect_city].

You can find in the following link a presentation of my services: [my_website_url_tracking].

Are you available any time during this week?

Excellent day !
